name: Hatsune Miku: Project Diva 2nd - The Idolm@ster Collaboration Pack #2
summary:
The second of two collaboration packs with Bandai Namco's "THE iDOLM@STER SP".
This collaboration pack features the following DLC content:

- "relations"

- Kagamine Rin Ami Mami Style
- Megurine Luka Chihaya Style

- "Kagamine Rin x iM@S Poster" Room Item (Wall)
- "Megurine Luka x iM@S Poster" Room Item (Wall)

videos.name: Gameplay Video
